original_text: That is why Manasseh's tribe received ten parts of the land, as well as Gilead and Bashan on the east side of the Jordan.
korean_text: 요단 동쪽 길르앗과 바산 외에 므낫세에게 열 분깃이 돌아갔으니

sentences.original_text: That is why Manasseh's tribe received ten parts of the land
sentences.korean_translation: 그것이 므낫세 지파가 땅의 열 부분을 받은 이유입니다

sentences.original_text: as well as Gilead and Bashan
on the east side of the Jordan
